description: Urban garden in southeastern San Diego, led by community members with the goal of augmenting food sovereignty in the area
Grassroots organization spreading general and technical knowledge about conservancy in underserved areas of San Diego
Environmental justice organization involved in education and building green infrastructure through partnerships with greater San Diego community
Advocacy group that seeks to educate policymakers and the general public about the basics of the climate crisis, has a San Diego chapter
Organization purchases land at risk of environmental damage in the San Dieguito River Valley and prevents local governments and companies from acting further
Works to revitalize natural areas in San Diego’s numerous canyons, promoting education and concrete action to restore natural environments
Global nonprofit organization geared towards water conservation/justice, based in San Diego
Conservancy organization for Batiquitos Lagoon in North County, volunteers work to preserve trails and features of natural reserve
Organization with a focus on rainwater harvesting both in San Diego and across the border into Mexico
Network for collective environmental action in San Diego region and beyond, provides access for local organizations to meet with climate leaders
Organization that educated on the environmental effects of general aviation in the San Diego region
Encourages native foliage planting and land stewardship in southern San Diego
